question: This company appointed Barney Harford as Chief Operating Officer.
explanation: Uber appoints former Orbitz CEO Barney Harford as chief operating officer( COO).Harford will be responsible for global operations, marketing and customer support for both the ridesharing business as well as Uber Eats. The CEO of Uber is Dara Khosrowshahi, who replaced co-founder Travis Kalanick recently.
